thread.title: Week 8 Texoma high school football Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Week 8 Texoma high school football Player of the Week

title: Week 8 Texoma high school football Player of the Week
text:
Week 8 Texoma high school football Player of the Week Week 8 Texoma high school football Player of the Week 
Ponder Herald Democrat 
Derrick Ponder, Sr. QB, Bells 
Ponder passed for 622 yards, the fifth-most in a single game in Texas high school football history, and 7 TDs and went over 10,000 career passing yards in a 62-36 win at Chico on Friday night.
